<!-- THIS FILE WAS AUTO-GENERATED by gendoc. DO NOT EDIT! -->


Functions for getting good random numbers.

# Normal functions

## get_random_int

```C
int get_random_int(int range)
```

Get a random integer value between 0 (inclusive) and `range` (exclusive).
